participant_abstract.sent: All roles presented their ideas which were then discussed.
I got positive feedback from the rest of the participants about the findings and we all now know where to go next.

participant_actions.sent: Basicaly, each participant needs to go and build on their ideas based on what was discused in the meeting.
Taking further steps in to creating a new and cool tv remote control.

participant_decisions.sent: From the discussions and the presentations done by each member of the group it was dicided that.
We would create a cheap, easy to use, look cool with the company logo's and overall company presentation.
Suttable for people who have RSI.

participant_problems.sent: The presentation were informative and well presented.
